16-year-old.context: This 16-year-old male fractured his nose playing basketball.

male.context: This 16-year-old male fractured his nose playing basketball.

nasal fracture.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

deviated nasal septum.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

obstruction.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: Nasal fracture and deviated nasal septum with obstruction.

left nasal obstruction.context: He has a left nasal obstruction and depressed left nasal bone.

depressed left nasal bone.context: He has a left nasal obstruction and depressed left nasal bone.

open reduction.context: Operation: Open reduction, nasal fracture with nasal septoplasty.

nasal septoplasty.context: Operation: Open reduction, nasal fracture with nasal septoplasty.

Betadine soap.context: The face was prepped with Betadine soap and solution and draped in a sterile fashion.

Afrin pledgets.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

Xylocaine.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

epinephrine.context: Nasal mucosa was decongested using Afrin pledgets as well as 1% Xylocaine, 1:100,000 epinephrine was injected into bilateral nasal septal mucoperichondrium and the nasal dorsum, lateral osteotomy sites.

caudal portion of the cartilaginous sept.context: Inspection revealed caudal portion of the cartilaginous septum lying crosswise across the nasal spine area and columella causing obstruction of the left nasal valve.

obstruction of the left nasal valve.context: Inspection revealed caudal portion of the cartilaginous septum lying crosswise across the nasal spine area and columella causing obstruction of the left nasal valve.

maxillary crest.context: Further up, the cartilaginous septum was displaced to the left of the maxillary crest.

supramaxillary crest.context: There was a large maxillary crest and supramaxillary crest had a large spur with the vomer bone touching the inferior turbinate.

vomer bone.context: There was a large maxillary crest and supramaxillary crest had a large spur with the vomer bone touching the inferior turbinate.

inferior turbinate.context: There was a large maxillary crest and supramaxillary crest had a large spur with the vomer bone touching the inferior turbinate.

left hemitransfixion incision.context: A left hemitransfixion incision was made.

mucoperichondrium elevated.context: Mucoperichondrium was elevated from left side of the cartilaginous septum and mucoperiosteum was elevated from the ethmoid plate.

vomer and inferior tunnel created.context: Vomer and inferior tunnel was created at the floor of the left side of the nose to connect the anterior and inferior tunnels, which was rather difficult at the area of the vomerine spur, which was very sharp and touching the inferior turbinate.

caudal cartilaginous septum separated.context: The caudal cartilaginous septum, which was lying crosswise, was separated from the main cartilage leaving approximately 1 cm strut.

right side mucoperichondrium released.context: The right side mucoperichondrium was released from the cartilaginous septum as well as ethmoid plate and the maxillary crest area.

caudal cartilaginous strut sutured.context: The caudal cartilaginous strut was sutured to the columella with interrupted #4-0 chromic catgut suture to bring it into the midline.

cartilaginous septum sutured.context: Further back, the cartilaginous septum anterior to the ethmoid plate was deviated to the left side, so it was freed from the maxillary crest, nasal dorsum, from the ethmoid plate, and was sutured in the midline with a transfixion #4-0 plain catgut sutures.

ethmoid plate partially removed.context: Further posteriorly, the ethmoid plate was deviated to the left side and portion of it was removed with Jansen-Middleton punch forceps.

maxillary crest removed.context: The main deviation was also caused by the vomerine crest and the maxillary crest and supramaxillary cartilaginous cartilage. This area was freed from the perichondrium on both sides. The maxillary crest was removed with a gouge.

vomer partially removed.context: Vomer was partially removed with a gouge and the rest of the vomer was displaced back into the midline.

septum filtered.context: The septum was also filtered with #4-0 plain catgut sutures.

septal splints tied.context: By valve, septal splints were tied to the septum bilaterally with a transfixion #5-0 nylon suture.

nasal bone refractured.context: Next, the nasal bone suture deviated to the left side were corrected. The right nasal bone was depressed and left nasal bone was wide. Therefore, the nasal bones were refractured back into the midline by compressing the left nasal bone and elevating the right nasal bone with the nasal bone elevator through the nasal cavities.

Steri-Strips applied.context: Steri-Strips were applied to the nasal dorsal skin and a Denver type of splint was applied to the nasal dorsal to stabilize the nasal bones.

Denver type of splint applied.context: Steri-Strips were applied to the nasal dorsal skin and a Denver type of splint was applied to the nasal dorsal to stabilize the nasal bones.

Telfa gauze packed.context: Nasal cavities were packed with Telfa gauze rolled on both sides with bacitracin ointment.

bacitracin ointment.context: Nasal cavities were packed with Telfa gauze rolled on both sides with bacitracin ointment.

approximate blood loss 10 to 20 mL.context: Approximate blood loss was 10 to 20 mL.
